name: X Fast Racing Highway City
description:
X Fast Racing Highway City is a very interesting straight-line racing game. In the game there are cars ranging from classic city cars to powerful modern sports cars and limousines. Every car here has its own technical specifications and a unique engine sound. You can drive up the highway, or walk in the city streets. If you are a great racer you can challenge the heavy traffic on the highway and enjoy the thrill of avoiding traffic. Start the engine, use nitrogen, chase as fast as possible.
Features:
- Customize your car
- Play games anytime, anywhere
- Real car physics effect
- beautiful 3D graphics
- Various epic cars
- Various different challenging missions
- can freely switch perspective.
